title: powers conferred on me by section 81 of the Finance Act 2015 (No. 52 of 2015)
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Disabled Drivers and Disabled
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Disabled Drivers and Disabled 

Passengers Fuel Grant (Amendment) Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited disabled driver disabled passenger fuel grant (amendment) regulation 2020

title: powers conferred on me by section 81 of the Finance Act 2015 (No. 52 of 2015)
heading: 2. The Disabled Drivers and Disabled Passengers Fuel Grant Regulations
text_raw:
2. The Disabled Drivers and Disabled Passengers Fuel Grant Regulations 
(S.I. No. 635 of 2015) (as amended by the Disabled Drivers and Disabled 
Passengers Fuel Grant (Amendment) Regulations 2019 (No. 686 of 2019)) are 
amended - 

(a) 

in Regulation 5(1) - 

(i) 

in paragraph (a), by the substitution of “Schedule 1,” for 
“Schedule 1, and”, 

(ii) by the substitution of the following paragraph for paragraph 

(b): 

“(b) in the case of hydrocarbon oil purchased on or after 1 
January 2020 and before 1 January 2021, in Schedule 
2, and”, 

and 

(iii) by the insertion of the following paragraph after paragraph 

(b): 

“(c) 

and 

in the case of hydrocarbon oil purchased on or after 1 
January 2021, in Schedule 3.”, 

(b) by the substitution of the following Schedules for Schedules 1 and 

2: 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 8th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Regulation 5(1)(a) 

“SCHEDULE 1 

Rates of fuel grant payable by type of hydrocarbon oil purchased on or before 

[748] 3 

Fuel Type 

Petrol 

Heavy Oil 

Liquefied petroleum gas 

31 December 2019 

Rate per litre 

€0.59 

€0.48 

€0.10 

 
 
 
 
 4 [748] 

Regulation 5(1)(b)
